title: Maruti Suzuki introduces new marketing campaign for its Smart Finance platform - The Financial Express
content: Maruti Suzuki introduces new marketing campaign for its Smart Finance platform  The Financial Express
description: Maruti Suzuki has introduced a new marketing campaign “Finance your car from anywhere” for its Smart Finance platform. Since its inception in 2020, over Rs 15,000 crores worth of loans are claimed to have been disbursed.
